abstract: Unemployment claims, Cisco earnings and other data weighed on investors around the world.
snippet: Unemployment claims, Cisco earnings and other data weighed on investors around the world.
lead_paragraph: A decline in technology shares and weak jobs data sent Wall Street indexes down on Thursday, as traders were confronted with more signs that the global economy was slowing.

headline.main: A Third Down Day on Wall Street
headline.print_headline: Markets Fall a 3rd Day on Slowdown Signs
